title: Alberta Pandas defeat UNB Reds to claim U Sports women's curling national championship
description: The University of Alberta Pandas defeated the UNB Reds 10-2 in the U Sports women's curling final on Sunday, while the Laurier Golden Hawks topped the Dalhousie Tigers 8-5 for the men's curling title.
content: The University of Alberta Pandas defeated the UNB Reds in the U Sports women s curling final on Sunday claiming their fourth national championship in six years The Pandas downed the McMaster Maurauders in the morning semifinal while the Reds secu chars
